Verses: 1 theeruvin Raajaavaagiya Eeraam Dhaaveedhinidaththil Sthaanaapadhigalaiyum, Avanukku Oru Veettaik Kattugiradharkuk Kedhurumarangalaiyum, Thachcharaiyum, Kalthachcharaiyum Anuppinaan.
2 karththar Thannai Isravelinmel Raajaavaagath Thidappaduththi, Isravelennum Thammudaiya Janaththinimiththam Thannudaiya Raajyaththai Migavum Uyarththinaar Endru Dhaaveedhu Arindhukondaan.
3 erusalemile Dhaaveedhu Pinnum Anega Sthreegalai Vivaagampanni, Pinnum Kumaararaiyum Kumaaraththigalaiyum Petraan.
4 erusalemile Avanukkup Pirandha Kumaararin Naamangalaavana: Sammuvaa, Sobaab, Naaththaan, Saalomon,

8 dhaaveedhu Samastha Isravelinmelum Raajaavaaga Abishegampannappattadhaip Pelisthar Kelvippattapodhu, Pelisthar Ellaarum Dhaaveedhaith Thedumpadi Vandhaargal; Adhai Dhaaveedhu Kettapodhu Avargalukku Virodhamaagap Purappattaan.
10 pelistharukku Virodhamaagap Pogalaamaa, Avargalai En Kaiyil Oppukkoduppeeraa Endru Dhaaveedhu Dhevanaik Kettapodhu, Karththar Po, Avargalai Un Kaiyil Oppukkoduppen Endraar.

11 avargal Paagaalpiraaseemukku Vandhapodhu, Dhaaveedhu Ange Avargalai Muriyadiththu Thanneergal Udaindhodugiradhupola, Dhevan En Kaiyinaal En Saththurukkalai Udaindhodappanninaarendraan; Adhinimiththam Andha Sthalaththirkup Paagaalpiraaseem Ennum Perittaargal.
12 ange Avargal Thangal Dheyvangalaivittu Odipponaargal; Dhaaveedhu Karpiththapadi Avaigal Akkiniyaale Sutterikkappattana.
13 pelisthar Marupadiyum Vandhu Andhap Pallaththaakkile Iranginaargal.

14 appozhudhu Dhaaveedhu Thirumba Dhevanidaththil Visaariththadharku, Dhevan Nee Avargalukkup Pinnaale Pogaamal, Avargalukkup Pakkamaai Sutri, Musukkattai Sedigalukku Edhireyirundhu, Avargalmel Paaindhu,
15 musukkattai Sedigalin Nunigalile Sellugira Raichchalai Nee Ketkumpodhu, Yuththaththirkup Purappadu; Pelistharin Paalayaththai Muriya Adikka Dhevan Unakku Munne Purappattiruppaar Endraar.
16 dhevan Thanakkuk Karpiththapadiye Dhaaveedhu Seydhapodhu, Pelistharin Raanuvaththaik Kibiyon Thuvakkik Kaasermattum Muriya Adiththaargal.
17 appadiye Dhaaveedhin Keerththi Sagala Dhesangalilum Prasiththamaagi, Avanukku Bayappadugira Bayaththaik Karththar Sagala Jaadhigalinmelum Varappanninaar.
